channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: HyperX Pulsefire Haste 2 Pro 4K Review: A Lighter and Faster Mouse
item.description: This slate gray mouse feels buttery smooth but is outshined by its cheaper non-pro sibling.

item.title: Meet the Game Developer Turning Fanfic Into Deadpool DLC
item.description: When Emma Kidwell got tapped to work on a new piece of content for Marvel’s Midnight Suns, she went back to her fanfic roots. She won’t be the only on...

item.title: How to Protect Your Cats (and Backyard Chickens) From Bird Flu
item.description: An H5N1 infection can be fatal for domestic animals, but there are steps you can take to minimize the risk of them catching the virus.

item.title: The Pebble E-Paper Smartwatch Is Back. Just Don't Call It Pebble
item.description: Pebble's founder is back with a company called Core Devices and two familiar smartwatches—Core 2 Duo and Core Time 2—but this time he's only making 10...

item.title: Al Gore’s Just Climate fund raises $175M from Microsoft and CalSTRS for nature-based climate investments
item.description: The new fund aims to restore nature to reverse biodiversity loss and emissions from land use. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use...

item.title: 11 Best Early Amazon Spring Sale Deals (2025)
item.description: Now’s your chance to save on headphones, tablets, and home gadgets.

item.title: CISA scrambles to contact fired employees after court rules layoffs ‘unlawful’
item.description: Federal court rules U.S. cybersecurity agency must re-hire over 100 former employees © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
